input_email_body:
Subject: Concerning a Major Medical Data Security Incident

A significant data breach happened yesterday owing to inadequate encryption and obsolete software You can reach me at sophia.rossi@service.it.. We have initiated a system restart, verified the firewalls, and contacted IT support, yet the issue remains unresolved. We urgently need your help to address this situation promptly. My name is Omar Hassan.
